titles.title: APEX Act

A bill to amend the Commodity Exchange Act to extend the jurisdiction of the Commodity Futures Trading Commission to include the setting of reference prices for aluminum premiums, and for other purposes.
Aluminum Pricing Examination Act
APEX Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
Aluminum Pricing Examination Act or the APEX Act
This bill authorizes the Commodity Futures Trading Commission to set reference prices for aluminum premiums.
